mean_cn: n.公文包，文件夹；投资组合
mean_en: a thin flat case used for carrying documents, drawings, etc.; (finance) a set of shares owned by a particular person or organization
sentence: He is checking his portfolio to find some documents.
sentence_trans: 他正在找公文包里的文件。
word_etyma: port拿，运 + folio树叶，页 → 拿树叶[书页]的东西 → 文件夹；投资组合
